mapper.select: select GVOTE_ITEM_ID, USER_ID, CREATE_ON from tr_gvote_result

select user.USER_ID,user.AVATAR_URL as url, user.NICKNAME as nickName, result.CREATE_ON as voteTime from tr_gvote_result result left join tm_user user on user.USER_ID =result.USER_ID where result.GVOTE_ITEM_ID=#{itemId, jdbcType=INTEGER} order by result.CREATE_ON
